thread.title_full: Pakistan: Military air strikes kill 22 militants in North Waziristan | War and Conflict

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Pakistan: Military air strikes kill 22 militants in North Waziristan | War and Conflict
text:
(Before It's News)
At least 22 militants were killed and six hideouts were destroyed in military air strikes carried out in North Waziristan tribal region of northern Pakistan, said the military on Sunday.
According to the Pakistani military’s Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR), Pakistan Air Force (PAF) jets carried out aerial strikes close to Pak-Afghan border ahead of Datta Khel area killing 22 terrorists.
[Read More…]
